name: Covid-Killer
description:
Get ready to shoot your way through hoards of covids!!!

What it is all about ?? This game is an extremely short game made in around 10hrs  for the bullet hell game jam.  The original time for the game jam was 7 days though I could work on it for only 1 -  2 hrs a day because I am only 13 and I have my school work to complete.  The game features a doctor in a hospital trying to save the world from Covid-19. Currently we have only five levels with infinite enemy spawning in random times and one boss. However I am planning to add more content to it. Tip : Try not to die!!! **Note : The game does not follow the theme** Tools used :

Unity Game engine. You can find it here

Libre Sprite for the art. You can find it here

Music from here

Sound effects from here

Explosion effects by ansimuz

How to play ??

WASD to move around

Left Mouse button to shoot

Your gun or rather the vaccine will always point towards the mouse pointer

Make sure to rate our game on the bullet hell jam  page.  It feels good !!
